title: Cosmic Queries: Holiday Edition
description: Get into the spirit (or should we say science?) of the season when Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic Chuck Nice answer fan questions about winter and the holidays.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
